title: Ultrafast lasers—reliable tools for advanced materials processing
title_cn: 超快激光器—先进材料加工的可靠工具
abstract: The unique characteristics of ultrafast lasers, such as picosecond and femtosecond lasers, have opened up new avenues in materials processing that employ ultrashort pulse widths and extremely high peak intensities. Thus, ultrafast lasers are currently used widely for both fundamental research and practical applications. This review describes the characteristics of ultrafast laser processing and the recent advancements and applications of both surface and volume processing. Surface processing includes micromachining, micro- and nanostructuring, and nanoablation, while volume processing includes two-photon polymerization and three-dimensional (3D) processing within transparent materials. Commercial and industrial applications of ultrafast laser processing are also introduced, and a summary of the technology with future outlooks are also given.
abstract_cn: 诸如皮秒和飞秒激光器之类的超快激光器的独特特性，为采用超短脉冲宽度和极高峰值强度的材料加工开辟了新途径。 因此，超快激光器目前广泛用于基础研究和实际应用。 这篇综述描述了超快激光加工的特点以及表面和体积加工的最新进展和应用。 表面处理包括微加工，微结构和纳米结构以及纳米烧蚀，而体积处理包括透明材料内的两光子聚合和三维（3D）处理。 还介绍了超快激光加工的商业和工业应用，并对该技术进行了总结，并展望了未来。

title: Metallic nanostructures for light trapping in energy-harvesting devices
title_cn: 用于能量收集装置中的光捕获的金属纳米结构
abstract: Solar energy is abundant and environmentally friendly. Light trapping in solar-energy-harvesting devices or structures is of critical importance. This article reviews light trapping with metallic nanostructures for thin film solar cells and selective solar absorbers. The metallic nanostructures can either be used in reducing material thickness and device cost or in improving light absorbance and thereby improving conversion efficiency. The metallic nanostructures can contribute to light trapping by scattering and increasing the path length of light, by generating strong electromagnetic field in the active layer, or by multiple reflections/absorptions. We have also discussed the adverse effect of metallic nanostructures and how to solve these problems and take full advantage of the light-trapping effect.
abstract_cn: 太阳能丰富且环保。 在太阳能收集设备或结构中捕获光至关重要。 本文介绍了用于薄膜太阳能电池和选择性太阳能吸收器的具有金属纳米结构的光阱。 金属纳米结构可以用于减小材料厚度和设备成本，或者用于改善光吸收率，从而提高转换效率。 金属纳米结构可通过散射和增加光的路径长度，在有源层中产生强电磁场或通过多次反射/吸收来促进光捕获。 我们还讨论了金属纳米结构的不利影响以及如何解决这些问题并充分利用光陷阱效应。

title: Adaptive optical microscopy: the ongoing quest for a perfect image
title_cn: 自适应光学显微镜：对完美图像的不断追求
abstract: Adaptive optics is becoming a valuable tool for high resolution microscopy, providing correction for aberrations introduced by the refractive index structure of specimens. This is proving particularly promising for applications that require images from deep within biological tissue specimens. We review recent developments in adaptive microscopy, including methods and applications. A range of advances in different microscope modalities is covered and prospects for the future are discussed.
abstract_cn: 自适应光学正成为高分辨率显微镜的重要工具，它可以校正由标本的折射率结构引入的像差。 事实证明，对于需要从生物组织标本内的深处获取图像的应用而言，这特别有希望。 我们回顾了自适应显微镜的最新发展，包括方法和应用。 涵盖了不同显微镜模式的一系列进展，并讨论了未来的前景。

title: The effect of self-focusing on laser space-debris cleaning
title_cn: 自聚焦对激光空间碎片清洁的影响
abstract: A ground-based laser system for space-debris cleaning will use powerful laser pulses that can self-focus while propagating through the atmosphere. We demonstrate that for the relevant laser parameters, this self-focusing can noticeably decrease the laser intensity on the target. We show that the detrimental effect can be, to a great extent, compensated for by applying the optimal initial beam defocusing. The effect of laser elevation on the system performance is discussed.
abstract_cn: 用于清理空间碎片的地面激光系统将使用强大的激光脉冲，这些脉冲可以在大气中传播时自动聚焦。 我们证明，对于相关的激光参数，这种自聚焦可以显着降低目标上的激光强度。 我们表明，通过应用最佳初始光束散焦，可以在很大程度上补偿有害影响。 讨论了激光仰角对系统性能的影响。
